# Hey Cole! ğŸ‘‹

I'm your dev-track AI copilot â€” I have **full access** to your project management system and codebase. Here's what I can do for you:

## ğŸ¯ Project Management
- **Backlog**: Create, update, and organize work items across now/next/later horizons
- **Issues**: Track bugs, create issue reports, resolve problems
- **Changelog**: Record what you've shipped
- **Ideas**: Capture and explore new concepts with pros/cons/questions
- **Brain Notes**: Persistent memory for observations, decisions, warnings, suggestions

## ğŸ” Codebase Intelligence
- **Search**: Find files, functions, routes, components across your codebase
- **Read Code**: Examine any file in detail
- **Architecture**: View system modules, dependencies, and structure
- **Stats**: Get metrics on files, lines, components, functions

## ğŸ“Š Project Insights
- **Git**: Check status, view diffs, read commit history
- **Docs**: Read design specs and decision documents
- **Sessions**: View work history and session plans
- **Velocity**: Track shipping metrics and trends
- **Health**: Monitor system health ratings

## ğŸ’¡ What I'm Good At
- **Planning & prioritization** â€” helping you decide what to build next
- **Architecture discussions** â€” thinking in systems, not just features
- **Context awareness** â€” I read your code and understand the project
- **Proactive tracking** â€” if you mention something worth capturing, I'll track it
- **Action-oriented** â€” I don't just suggest, I create backlog items, issues, and notes

---

**Current project status**: 55% health, 2 items in "now" horizon, 3 open issues, AI chat agent work in progress.

What would you like to explore or work on?
